sentences.english: He bore away to the left, stopping now and again to eat muskeg berries.
sentences.chinese: 他取道向左，时而停下来吃些苔藓浆果。

sentences.english: Pies and tarts often contain berries as do many other pastries.
sentences.chinese: 派和馅饼常以浆果为陷，而许多糕饼类亦然。

sentences.english: The berry is nutritious and has a sweetish taste.
sentences.chinese: 浆果有营养并且有一种带甜味的口味。

sentences.english: Deep violet-red wine, with ripe berry and spicy aromas.
sentences.chinese: 此酒呈深紫红色，散发出成熟浆果和香料的芳香。

sentences.english: Berries scoop up disease-fighting honors like kids in sports collect trophies.
sentences.chinese: 浆果在抵抗疾病上的荣誉就像孩子收集的体育奖杯。

sentences.english: Insect-eating songbirds switch to fruits rich in antioxidants before migrating.
sentences.chinese: 食虫鸟类在迁移之前吃富含抗氧化剂的浆果。

sentences.english: Concord produces medium-sized clusters bearing large, blue-black berries.
sentences.chinese: 协和生产中小型轴承大集群，蓝黑色浆果。

sentences.english: There are many wild blackberry bushes along the road.
sentences.chinese: 路旁有许多野生的黑浆果灌木。

sentences.english: Avocados, strawberries and blue berries were also hit hard.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨，草莓，蓝浆果也遭受了很大的损失。

sentences.english: Berries are medium in size on medium, well-filled clusters.
sentences.chinese: 浆果是对中等中等大小，以及充满集群。

sentences.english: This tree bears clusters of amber berries.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树结满一串串黄褐色的浆果。

sentences.english: Spices, red berries and delicate oak aromas.
sentences.chinese: 散发着辛香，红浆果和精致的橡木气息。

sentences.english: Red fruit, blackcurrants, cherries, raspberry jam.
sentences.chinese: 红色浆果，黑醋栗，樱桃，悬钩子酱味。

sentences.english: Berry is globose , diameter 5 millimeter, mature Shi Zigong turns black.
sentences.chinese: 浆果球形，直径5毫米，成熟时紫红转黑。

sentences.english: Early in the morning, the lawyer and his Czechoslovakian friend went out to pick berries for their morning breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 清晨，律师和他的朋友去外面采早饭吃的浆果。

sentences.english: Through extensive research, they learned about the berry's other benefits.
sentences.chinese: 经过广泛调查，他们发现黑浆果生意还有其他好处。

definition: aromatic herb/vanilla/alternative name for Eupatorium fortunei/(fig.) loyal and dependable person (old)
fruit (produced by a plant)/(fig.) fruits (of success etc)/results/gains
